event: DJS placement not under fluoroscopy guidance
advised for stent removal after 5 months
KUB x-ray film showed abnormal DJS location
DJS appeared to enter into the IVC
urine culture positive for Enterococcus faecalis
CDFI showed small mural thrombus in IVC
migration of DJS into IVC at left renal vein level
distal coil in left renal pelvis
new DJS location confirmed by radiologic imaging
CDFI showed no thrombus in IVC
